ShefRobot

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • ShefRobot.Robot

  • public class Robot
extends Object
    Objects of this class represent particular EV3 based Lego robots.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Robot()
      Create a new Robot object.
      Robot(String ip)
      Create a new Robot object with a specific IP address.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close a Robot's connections.
      void closeMotor(Motor.Port port)
      This method allows you to close one Motor connection.
      void closeSensor(Sensor.Port port)
      This method allows you to close one Sensor connection.
      Buttons getButtons()
      Get a Buttons object You can use Buttons for creating ButtonListeners and waiting for ButtonPresses
      ColorSensor getColorSensor(Sensor.Port port)
      Get a ColorSensor object attached to the specified port.
      GyroSensor getGyroSensor(Sensor.Port port)
      Get a GyroSensor object attached to the specified port.
      LargeMotor getLargeMotor(Motor.Port port)
      Get a Motor object attached to the specified port.
      MediumMotor getMediumMotor(Motor.Port port)
      Get a Motor object attached to the specified port.
      Speaker getSpeaker()
      Get a Speaker object You can use a Speaker for playing tones through the Robot
      TouchSensor getTouchSensor(Sensor.Port port)
      Get an TouchSensor object attached to the specified port.
      UltrasonicSensor getUltrasonicSensor(Sensor.Port port)
      Get an UltrasonicSensor object attached to the specified port.
      static void sleep(long millis)
      Causes the currently executing thread to sleep (temporarily cease execution) for the specified number of milliseconds, subject to the precision and accuracy of system timers and schedulers.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Robot

        public Robot()
        Create a new Robot object. This will find the first available EV3 on the local network or Bluetooth.

      • Robot

        public Robot(String ip)
        Create a new Robot object with a specific IP address.
        Parameters:
        ip - This defines the IP address of the Robot.

    • Method Detail

      • getLargeMotor

        public LargeMotor getLargeMotor(Motor.Port port)
        Get a Motor object attached to the specified port. If a LargeMotor is already attached to this port, then this function will retern a reference to that Motor object, otherwise a new object is (re)created.
        Parameters:
        port - The port to which the motor is connected. Must be from Motor.Port.
        Returns:
        The LargeMotor object.
        See Also:
        Motor

      • getMediumMotor

        public MediumMotor getMediumMotor(Motor.Port port)
        Get a Motor object attached to the specified port. If a MediumMotor is already attached to this port, then this function will retern a reference to that Motor object, otherwise a new object is (re)created.
        Parameters:
        port - The port to which the motor is connected. Must be from Motor.Port.
        Returns:
        The MediumMotor object.
        See Also:
        Motor

      • getSpeaker

        public Speaker getSpeaker()
        Get a Speaker object You can use a Speaker for playing tones through the Robot
        Returns:
        The Speaker object.
        See Also:
        Speaker

      • getButtons

        public Buttons getButtons()
        Get a Buttons object You can use Buttons for creating ButtonListeners and waiting for ButtonPresses
        Returns:
        The Buttons object.
        See Also:
        Buttons

      • getUltrasonicSensor

        public UltrasonicSensor getUltrasonicSensor(Sensor.Port port)
        Get an UltrasonicSensor object attached to the specified port. If an UltrasonicSensor is already attached to this port, then this function will retern a reference to that Sensor object, otherwise a new object is created.
        Parameters:
        port - The port to which the sensor is connected. Must be from Sensor.Port.
        Returns:
        The UltrasonicSensor object.

      • getTouchSensor

        public TouchSensor getTouchSensor(Sensor.Port port)
        Get an TouchSensor object attached to the specified port. If an TouchSensor is already attached to this port, then this function will retern a reference to that Sensor object, otherwise a new object is created.
        Parameters:
        port - The port to which the sensor is connected. Must be from Sensor.Port.
        Returns:
        The TouchSensor object.

      • getColorSensor

        public ColorSensor getColorSensor(Sensor.Port port)
        Get a ColorSensor object attached to the specified port. If a ColorSensor is already attached to this port, then this function will retern a reference to that Sensor object, otherwise a new object is created.
        Parameters:
        port - The port to which the sensor is connected. Must be from Sensor.Port.
        Returns:
        The ColorSensor object.

      • getGyroSensor

        public GyroSensor getGyroSensor(Sensor.Port port)
        Get a GyroSensor object attached to the specified port. If a GyroSensor is already attached to this port, then this function will retern a reference to that Sensor object, otherwise a new object is created.
        Parameters:
        port - The port to which the sensor is connected. Must be from Sensor.Port.
        Returns:
        The GyroSensor object.

      • sleep

        public static void sleep(long millis)
        Causes the currently executing thread to sleep (temporarily cease execution) for the specified number of milliseconds, subject to the precision and accuracy of system timers and schedulers.
        Parameters:
        millis - the length of time to sleep in milliseconds
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the value of millis is negative

      • close

        public void close()
        Close a Robot's connections.

      • closeMotor

        public void closeMotor(Motor.Port port)
        This method allows you to close one Motor connection.
        Parameters:
        port - The port to which the motor is connected.

      • closeSensor

        public void closeSensor(Sensor.Port port)
        This method allows you to close one Sensor connection.
        Parameters:
        port - The port to which the sensor is connected.
